name: Guns N' Violets
description:
You're a gardener who had your beautiful flowers attacked by some strange creatures, kill them to get your revenge! You will need to protect your last Violet from the monsters, they will appear from any direction, shoot them!

Controls: 

  • WASD for movement. 
  • Left Mouse Button to shoot and Right Mouse Button to Dash.
  • Spacebar to launch a Grenade.

Game made to Ludum Dare 46. #ldjam #ldjam46
